articles.title: OpenAI reportedly developing new generative music tool
articles.description: Such a tool could be used to add music to existing videos, or to add guitar accompaniment to an existing vocal track, sources said.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: Who are AI browsers for?
articles.description: OpenAI launched an AI-powered browser this week, but it feels like it offers a slight efficiency gain at best.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: TikTok robot star Rizzbot gave me the middle finger
articles.description: About a week ago, I woke to a dizzying DM on Instagram — Rizzbot flipping me off. This sent me down a rabbit hole about humanoids in society.
articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis

articles.title: India, the market BlaBlaCar once walked away from, is now its biggest
articles.description: BlaBlaCar is seeing rapid growth in India, with 20 million passengers expected this year — up 50% from last year.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: The glaring security risks with AI browser agents
articles.description: New AI browsers from OpenAI and Perplexity promise to increase user productivity, but they also come with increased security risks.
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff

articles.title: Musk’s ad chief at X departs after just 10 months
articles.description: The revolving door reportedly reflects deeper tensions.
articles.author: Connie Loizos
